synopsis: High-school student Handa Sei is well-liked and highly regarded -- except in his own mind.

title.jp: Handa-kun to 1-wa no Tsuzuki / Handa-kun to Iinchou / Handa-kun to Model

synopsis: As likeable as Handa is, his negative outlook leads to mixed results in his encounters with various students.

title.jp: Handa-kun to Futoukou / Handa-kun to Chouri Jisshuu / Hana-kun to Shinyuu

synopsis: Handa's daily antics inspire even more students to embrace him as a treasured friend -- unfortunately, without him realizing it.

title.jp: Handa-kun to Handa-kun? / Handa-kun to Onna no Shitto / Handa-kun to Shakousei

synopsis: Handa-kun has proven that he has an unusual charm attracting various people to him, including those he may not want to be associated with...

title.jp: Handa-kun to Seitokai / Handa-kun to Kioku Soushitsu

synopsis: Despite his best efforts, Handa continues to get involved in the most bizarre situations. This time, his misadventures end up affecting his memory.

title.jp: Handa-kun to Tomodachi no Tomodachi / Handa-kun to Dash Higashino / Handa-kun to Tesouuranai

synopsis: Kawafuji decides to introduce Handa to his friend, but as usual, Handa's knack for misinterpretation turns the entire situation on its head.

title.jp: Handa-kun to Tsuishi / Handa-kun to Toshoshitsu

synopsis: Sadly, the Handa Force has two members who need to take the supplementary exam. What they don't realize is that Handa himself is in the same boat.
The school trip becomes an unforgettable experience for Handa and the Handa Force when they encounter Ichimiya and his gang from Shiro High.

title.jp: Handa-kun to Kaeru / Handa-kun to Stalker

synopsis: Handa's teacher plans to have his students dissect frogs, and Handa wants no part of it. But, as usual, Handa's feelings fail to come across.

title.jp: Handa-kun to Heibon / Handa-kun to Bishoujo

synopsis: Kondo's time to shine finally arrives, while Handa gets caught in a conversation with a bishoujo figure.
Amidst preparations for the upcoming school cultural festival, Handa begins to gain a new perspective.
High-school student Handa Sei is well-liked and highly regarded. As the school cultural festival comes to a close, Handa's world opens up before him.
